q1: Do you think this team will qualify for the next World Cup?
a1: Juventus are a Club team and not an International Team, therefore not eligible for the World Cup.
q2: Has Juventas won any international tournaments?
a2: No they have't as they don't play in any because they are a club team not international team
q3: in what tournaments does Juventus play?
a3: UEFA Champions League, they also play in Serie A
q5: There are many coaches in Juventus. One of them is Antonio Conte.
a5: yes.Juventus appoint Antonio Conte as new manager
